isis.stitle: FRONT STEER AXLE: EATON EFA-12 - LUBRICATE

svcproc.title: LUBRICATE
svcproc.para: Pressure-Fitting Grease - Heavy-duty, multipurpose lithium base (#2 grade). Do not mix with sodium base grease.

Knuckle Pins, Thrust Bearings, Tie Rod Ends- Pressure lubricate every 25,000 miles (40,000 km). Use grease specified above. Knuckles or tie rod ends without grease fittings are permanently lubricated.

Wheel Bearings - Refer to GROUP 02 - FRONT AXLES in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual for the type of grease or oil and frequency of lubrication. Generally, lubricate at each brake overhaul or when hub/drum is removed for service.

General Procedure for Grease Lubricated Wheel BearingsThoroughly clean bearings, spindle, hub cap, and hub cavity. Parts may be washed in a suitable commercial solvent. Be certain parts are free of moisture or other contaminants.
Fill wheel hub with grease to inside diameter of bearing cups. Fill hub cap. Grease bearing cones by forcing grease between rollers, cones, and cage.
General Procedure for Oil Lubricated Wheel BearingsFill hub (or wheel) to oil level line on hub cap.
